first_tick_commands: execute unless score @s power_plus.Donor.Toggle.Regenerative_Segmentation matches 0.. run scoreboard players set @s power_plus.Donor.Toggle.Regenerative_Segmentation 0
execute unless score @s Power.Toggleable matches 0.. run scoreboard players set @s Power.Toggleable 0
execute unless score @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Halt matches 0.. run scoreboard players set @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Halt 0
execute unless score @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Head matches 0.. run scoreboard players set @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Head 17
execute unless score @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Body matches 0.. run scoreboard players set @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Body 20
execute unless score @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Right.Arm matches 0.. run scoreboard players set @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Right.Arm 18
execute unless score @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Left.Arm matches 0.. run scoreboard players set @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Left.Arm 18
execute unless score @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Right.Hand matches 0.. run scoreboard players set @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Right.Hand 12
execute unless score @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Left.Hand matches 0.. run scoreboard players set @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Left.Hand 12
execute unless score @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Legs matches 0.. run scoreboard players set @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Legs 20
execute unless score @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Feet matches 0.. run scoreboard players set @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Feet 11

Toggle_Ability_Bar.title: Toggle Ability Bar
Toggle_Ability_Bar.description: Toggles off the ability bar for this power but keeps passives enabled.

commands: execute unless score @s power_plus.Donor.Geo.Boots.Mats matches 8.. run scale set pehkui:eye_height 0.9 @s[scores={power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Feet=0}]
execute unless score @s power_plus.Donor.Geo.Boots.Mats matches 8.. run scale set pehkui:eye_height 0.6 @s[scores={power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Legs=0}]

execute unless score @s power_plus.Donor.Geo.Gauntlets.Mats matches 12.. unless score @s power_plus.Donor.Geo.Chest.Mats matches 12.. unless score @s power_plus.Donor.Geo.Boots.Mats matches 8.. run scale set pehkui:eye_height 0.2 @s[scores={power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Body=0}]
execute unless score @s power_plus.Donor.Geo.Boots.Mats matches 8.. run scale set pehkui:hitbox_height 0.9 @s[scores={power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Feet=0}]
execute unless score @s power_plus.Donor.Geo.Boots.Mats matches 8.. run scale set pehkui:hitbox_height 0.6 @s[scores={power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Legs=0}]

execute unless score @s power_plus.Donor.Geo.Gauntlets.Mats matches 12.. unless score @s power_plus.Donor.Geo.Chest.Mats matches 12.. unless score @s power_plus.Donor.Geo.Boots.Mats matches 8.. run scale set pehkui:hitbox_height 0.3 @s[scores={power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Body=0}]

execute unless score @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Head >= @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Head run scoreboard players add @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Head 1

execute unless score @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Body >= @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Body run scoreboard players add @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Body 1

execute unless score @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Right.Arm >= @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Right.Arm run scoreboard players add @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Right.Arm 1

execute unless score @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Left.Arm >= @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Left.Arm run scoreboard players add @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Left.Arm 1

execute unless score @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Right.Hand >= @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Right.Hand run scoreboard players add @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Right.Hand 1

execute unless score @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Left.Hand >= @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Right.Hand run scoreboard players add @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Left.Hand 1

execute unless score @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Legs >= @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Legs run scoreboard players add @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Legs 1

execute unless score @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Feet >= @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Feet run scoreboard players add @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Feet 1
execute unless score @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Head matches 4.. run scoreboard players set @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Body 0
execute unless score @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Body matches 7.. run scoreboard players set @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Legs 0
execute unless score @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Body matches 7.. run scoreboard players set @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Right.Arm 0
execute unless score @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Body matches 7.. run scoreboard players set @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Left.Arm 0
execute unless score @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Right.Arm matches 5.. run scoreboard players set @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Right.Hand 0
execute unless score @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Left.Arm matches 5.. run scoreboard players set @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Left.Hand 0
execute unless score @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Legs matches 5.. run scoreboard players set @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Feet 0

execute if score @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Head >= @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Head run scoreboard players operation @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Head = @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Head

execute if score @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Body >= @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Body run scoreboard players operation @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Body = @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Body

execute if score @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Right.Arm >= @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Right.Arm run scoreboard players operation @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Right.Arm = @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Right.Arm

execute if score @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Left.Arm >= @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Left.Arm run scoreboard players operation @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Left.Arm = @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Left.Arm

execute if score @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Right.Hand >= @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Right.Hand run scoreboard players operation @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Right.Hand = @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Right.Hand

execute if score @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Left.Hand >= @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Left.Hand run scoreboard players operation @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Left.Hand = @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Left.Hand

execute if score @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Legs >= @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Legs run scoreboard players operation @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Legs = @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Legs

execute if score @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Feet >= @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Feet run scoreboard players operation @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Feet = @s power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Feet
execute anchored eyes run function donor:powers/dead_road

first_tick_commands: execute as @s[scores={power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Right.Hand=4..}] rotated ~ 0 run particle weave:blood_undead ^-0.5 ^0.9 ^0.2 0.2 0.2 0.2 0 15
execute as @s[scores={power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Left.Hand=4..}] rotated ~ 0 run particle weave:blood_undead ^0.5 ^0.9 ^0.2 0.2 0.2 0.2 0 15
Part_Bullet.Bone_Blades.title: Bone blades

first_tick_commands: execute rotated ~ 0 positioned ^ ^ ^0.3 run particle weave:blood_undead ~ ~1.2 ~ 0.3 0.05 0.3 0 15
execute as @s[scores={power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Right.Hand=4..}] rotated ~ 0 run particle weave:blood_undead ^-0.5 ^0.9 ^0.2 0.2 0.2 0.2 0 15
execute as @s[scores={power_plus.Donor.Regenerative_Segmentation.Stage.Left.Hand=4..}] rotated ~ 0 run particle weave:blood_undead ^0.5 ^0.9 ^0.2 0.2 0.2 0.2 0 15
